name: choreographically
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that relates to choreography (= the skill of combining movements into dances to be performed): Choreographically, this production remains completely faithful to the original. Three of the four ballets are choreographically excellent.
More examplesFewer examplesChoreographically, his strengths are in solo creation, while his group work is often fairly ordinary.Choreographically and dramatically, the work is unusual. The work is choreographically uninspired, and the design elements are weak.This new version is choreographically different from the original, but the story is the same.
